full_summary:
# W7701-227425-2: Request for Standing Offer for Precision Mechanical Manufacturing Services

**Solicitation Information**

* **Title/Title (English/French):** Precision Mechanical Manufacturing
* **Reference/Numero reference:** WS3741443149
* **Amendment Number/Numero de modification:** 0
* **Publication Date/Date de publication:** November 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date/Date de clôture:** November 24, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Start Date/Date de début contrat:** N/A
* **Contract End Date/Date fin contrat:** December 20, 2025
* **Contract Category/Categorie de contrat:** Service/ Service
* **Procurement Method/Methode d'approvisionnement:** Competitive/Open Bidding
* **Contract Value/Value du contrat:** N/A
* **Bid Evaluation/Besoin de soumission:** Lowest Price

**Eligibility Criteria**

* **Eligibility Criteria/Modalités de soumission:** Open to all eligible Canadian contractors

**Notice Information**

* **Notice URL/URL du cahier de charges:** [insert URL]
* **Contact Information/Informations de contact:**
 Name/Nom: Annie Deslauriers, SPAC/PSPC
Email/Courriel: annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

***

### How to Bid

To participate in this solicitation, please submit your bid electronically to the above address no later than November 24, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

This solicitation cancels and supersedes all previous solicitations and requires that all required documentation and bid submissions be received on or before the deadline.

### Payment Terms

Payment will be made upon receipt of invoice and satisfactory completion of work. The payor is the Government of Canada.

***

This is a call for precision mechanical manufacturing services with the Government of Canada. Only bid electronically. The contact person is Annie Deslauriers from the Government of Canada. I hope this formatted and rewritten contract meets the required expectations to you. Do not hesitate if you need any further changes. Have a great day ! 

Best regards, [Your Name]. 

Note: To attach this meeting topic point to the updated rewritten doc, you could create an Appendix as follows:

*Appendix: Required Documents
